### RISO Laundry/Dry Cleaning Services

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number:** PW-_MCT-046-6237
* **Solicitation Number:** W0501-23C004/A
* **Publication Date:** August 17, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 13, 2022 (1:00:00 PM)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

#### Background

Trade Agreement: CFTA / CPTPP

Base Gagetown located in Oromocto, New Brunswick, has a requirement for the provision of laundry/dry cleaning services for the Department of National Defense, 5 CDSG Gagetown on an as and when required basis for the period April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024, with two (2) one-option years (April 1, 2024 to March 31, 2025 and April 1, 2025 to March 31, 2026).

#### Service Requirements

Items included as per Annex A and B

No security requirement associated with this request.

#### Tender Process

All interested suppliers may submit a bid.

A standing offer is an agreement and not a contract. Offerors should note that there is no guarantee that the full or any amount of the Standing Offer will be called up.

All inquiries of a technical nature and all questions of a contractual nature are to be submitted in writing to the Contractual Authority: Kristelle LeBlanc, telephone - (506) 377-7458, email - kristelle.leblanc@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca. Inquiries are to be made in writing and should be received no less than five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date to allow sufficient time to respond.

#### Documents

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Details for Response

The tender description and required documents are available on the [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) website.
